3.1.2. constants Module¶

3.1.3. data_controller Module¶

class core.data_controller.DataController(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: dict

The class extends the python dictionary to support using friendlier syntax:
data.key = value
instead of
data[‘key’] = value

The class also provides pickling capacities to store data and load data.

static load(filename)[source]¶
save(filename)[source]¶

3.1.5. experiment Module¶

class core.experiment.Experiment(params)[source]¶

Bases: object

The experiment class provides a general framework for defining a numerical experiment and running it.

Any experiment should be subclassed from this “Experiment” cass. The functions to implement are “_initialize”, “_compute” and “_visualize”.

The class provides methods to save data automatically to a central location.

By convention a subclass should never modify the parameters passed to it. Use self.data.var_name or self.var_name depending on whether the data should be saved or not

compute()[source]¶

Abstract base for the computation of an experiment

load(filename)¶
save()[source]¶

Save the data and the parameters

visualize()[source]¶

Abstract base for the visualization of an experiment
